14
15#ifndef DNS_UPDATE_H
16#define DNS_UPDATE_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/update.h */
19
20/***
21 *** Imports
22 ***/
23
24#include <inttypes.h>
25
26#include <isc/lang.h>
27
28#include <dns/types.h>
29#include <dns/diff.h>
30
31typedef struct {
32 void (*func)(void *arg, dns_zone_t *zone, int level,
33 const char *message);
34 void *arg;
35} dns_update_log_t;
36
37ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
38
39/***
40 *** Functions
41 ***/
42
43uint32_t
44dns_update_soaserial(uint32_t serial, dns_updatemethod_t method);
45/*%<
46 * Return the next serial number after 'serial', depending on the
47 * update method 'method':
48 *
49 *\li * dns_updatemethod_increment increments the serial number by one
50 *\li * dns_updatemethod_unixtime sets the serial number to the current
51 * time (seconds since UNIX epoch) if possible, or increments by one
52 * if not.
53 */
54
55isc_result_t
56dns_update_signatures(dns_update_log_t *log, dns_zone_t *zone, dns_db_t *db,
57 dns_dbversion_t *oldver, dns_dbversion_t *newver,
58 dns_diff_t *diff, uint32_t sigvalidityinterval);
59
60isc_result_t
61dns_update_signaturesinc(dns_update_log_t *log, dns_zone_t *zone, dns_db_t *db,
62 dns_dbversion_t *oldver, dns_dbversion_t *newver,
63 dns_diff_t *diff, uint32_t sigvalidityinterval,
64 dns_update_state_t **state);
65
66ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
67
68#endif /* DNS_UPDATE_H */
69
